Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the rather busy intersection of Lelion Way and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive runs north and south, intersecting Lelion Way, which runs to the east and west. On the northwest corner of the intersection, you can see a number of small shrines dedicated to the lesser known and lesser accepted dieties of different races, such as goblins, drow and kobolds. An apple orchid is guarded by a wooden fence on the southeast corner of the intersection.
